column1: Family and friends will be received from 10 am to 11 am Wednesday at the JOHN J. LOPATICH FUNERAL HOME
column4: Latrobe. A military service will be conducted at 10:30 am by the American Legion Post No. 515 and V.F.W. Post Nos. 3414 and 444. A funeral service will be held at 11 am Wednesday in the funeral home with the Rev. Jeffrey Schock officiating. Inurnment will follow at Westmoreland Memorial Park.
